thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 2 of 116
thread.title: SuzanneS

author: SuzanneS
title: SuzanneS
text: Some of the prices are a little high but they have everything! Shipping is on time and having it come to the door (if my postman doesn't try jamming it in my box) is terrific. Having to talk to a representative has always been a pleasant experience. The automatic reorder feature is a great feature knowing my product will be sent without my having to call it in. Thanks to this company.
